serverSide.sharedRegions

Class GeneralRepos

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.GeneralRepos

  • public class GeneralRepos
extends java.lang.Object
    General Repository.

    It is responsible to keep the visible internal state of the problem and to provide means for it to be printed in the logging file. It is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. There are no internal synchronization points.
